entry.title: Increase channel-jamming capital requirements by not counting dust HTLCs
entry.summary: In the given context, there is a discussion about the counting of dust and trimmed HTLCs towards max_accepted_htlcs. The speaker suggests that counting dust towards that amount should not be done. However, they express a need to think more about the issue where it's not possible to lower the feerate. This seems like a spec issue according to the speaker. The discussion revolves around the technicalities of Bitcoin Lightning Network (Lnd) and its implementation.
